bibl.title: Antiochus IV Epiphanes and the Ptolemaic Triad: The Three Uprooted Horns in Dan 7:8, 20 and 24 Reconsidered. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Pp. 532-546: The joint rule of Ptolemy VI, Ptolemy VIII and Cleopatra II [with Greek papyrological and epigraphic evidence].
bibl.seg: BLASIUS Andreas, Antiochus IV Epiphanes and the Ptolemaic Triad: The Three Uprooted Horns in Dan 7:8, 20 and 24 Reconsidered. Avec résumé en anglais.
Pp. 532-546: The joint rule of Ptolemy VI, Ptolemy VIII and Cleopatra II [with Greek papyrological and epigraphic evidence].
